mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales_emergency ( emergency_no, type, salesperson_id, customer_id, related_id, title, description, customer_request, urgency, solution_content, proposed_by, cost_impact, risk_level, status, current_handler_id, approval_comment, occur_time, deadline, created_time, updated_time ) VALUES ( #{emergencyNo}, #{type}, #{salespersonId}, #{customerId}, #{relatedId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{customerRequest}, #{urgency}, #{solutionContent}, #{proposedBy}, #{costImpact}, #{riskLevel}, #{status}, #{currentHandlerId}, #{approvalComment}, #{occurTime}, #{deadline}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT se.*, e1.name as salesperson_name, c.name as customer_name, e2.name as current_handler_name, e3.name as proposed_by_name FROM sales_emergency se LEFT JOIN employees e1 ON se.salesperson_id = e1.id LEFT JOIN customers c ON se.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN employees e2 ON se.current_handler_id = e2.id LEFT JOIN employees e3 ON se.proposed_by = e3.id WHERE se.id = #{id} AND se.is_deleted = 0

SELECT se.*, e1.name as salesperson_name, c.name as customer_name, e2.name as current_handler_name FROM sales_emergency se LEFT JOIN employees e1 ON se.salesperson_id = e1.id LEFT JOIN customers c ON se.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN employees e2 ON se.current_handler_id = e2.id WHERE se.salesperson_id = #{salespersonId} AND se.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY se.created_time DESC

SELECT se.*, e1.name as salesperson_name, c.name as customer_name, e2.name as current_handler_name FROM sales_emergency se LEFT JOIN employees e1 ON se.salesperson_id = e1.id LEFT JOIN customers c ON se.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN employees e2 ON se.current_handler_id = e2.id WHERE se.current_handler_id = #{handlerId} AND se.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY se.urgency ASC, se.created_time DESC

SELECT se.*, e1.name as salesperson_name, c.name as customer_name, e2.name as current_handler_name FROM sales_emergency se LEFT JOIN employees e1 ON se.salesperson_id = e1.id LEFT JOIN customers c ON se.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN employees e2 ON se.current_handler_id = e2.id WHERE se.current_handler_id = #{managerId} AND se.status = 'PENDING' AND se.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY se.urgency ASC, se.created_time DESC

SELECT se.*, e1.name as salesperson_name, c.name as customer_name, e2.name as current_handler_name FROM sales_emergency se LEFT JOIN employees e1 ON se.salesperson_id = e1.id LEFT JOIN customers c ON se.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN employees e2 ON se.current_handler_id = e2.id WHERE se.status = #{status} AND se.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY se.created_time DESC
